publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1935 Jamie Hepburn: UN Convention on Rights of Persons with Disabilities—That the Parliament notes that 26 countries have already ratified the UN Convention on the Rights of People with Disabilities and believes that the UK Government should ratify the convention at the earliest possible opportunity to signal that disabled citizens of the United Kingdom enjoy the same human rights afforded in all decent societies. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*
